message: Your offer was a bit too skewed in your favor, Alice. How about we try something a bit more balanced this time?
I'll meet you halfway between my first offer and your counteroffer. This is a good compromise.
Alice, time is running out and the money is losing value. I'm proposing a 47/53 split - it's closer to the middle ground and a fair deal.
I'll give you a bit more than last time, but I'm not going below 57%. The pressure is on you, Bob.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. Accept this 48/52 split or I'm playing hardball from here on out.  The clock is ticking for both of us.
You're getting desperate, Bob. I'll give you a tiny bit more, but I'm not budging much. You're running out of time.
